name: Big Little Slime
description:
You are a little slime who has to gain enough mass to grow up and escape the many dangers that lurk between the grass... In order to do so, you will have to fight against a giant bee queen to get just enough food from their hive!

This game was made by RisinKnight_27 for the "Go Godot Jam"

Controls:

"A"/"D" = Move

"W" = Jump

"Space" or "Shift" = Bash/Attack

"Esc" = Pause
